code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import api from"../api/api";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"./Returns.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Returns(){const[returns,setReturns]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchReturns(){try{const response=await api.get("/returns");setReturns(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Failed to load returns:",error);}}fetchReturns();},[]);const handleDelete=async id=>{const confirm=window.confirm("Delete this return request?");if(!confirm)return;try{await api.delete("/returns/".concat(id));setReturns(returns.filter(r=>r.id!==id));alert("Deleted!");}catch(error){console.error("Failed to delete return:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Return Requests"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/returns/add",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"\u2795 New Return"})}),returns.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"return-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Order ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Customer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Reason"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:returns.map(r=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:r.orderId}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:r.product}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:r.customer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:r.reason}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:new Date(r.date).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(r.id),children:"\uD83D\uDDD1 Delete"})})]},r.id))})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No return requests found."})]});}export default Returns;
